meaningMnemonic: You <radical>loiter</radical> around your <radical>master</radical> until he <kanji>depart</kanji>s on a <kanji>journey</kanji>. You have a lot more freedom to do things after your master has departed, so until that time you just loiter about looking busy and staying out of his way.
readingMnemonic: Finally, it's time for your master's <kanji>journey</kanji> and he calls to you and says, "You are the <reading>王</reading> (おう) of the house now. Take care of everything while I'm gone."
